name: CUBICLES (IIA)
description:
Digital Art by The Indian Institute of Architects Representative,  Tabassum Abdul Raheem

The uniqueness of architectural firms is that it doesn't contain the designers into a cubicle, you get to have your creative freedom as well as a barrier-free workspace which gives space for open discussions and suggestions. However, with the pandemic we were put into cubicles anyway, separated by walls and distance. Connection errors and low bandwidth reduced the ease of teamwork and the feeling of togetherness was determined by Wi-Fi strength.
